meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>Extract</kanji> a lucky ticket to <kanji>choose</kanji> the winner of the <vocabulary>lottery</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>raffle</vocabulary>! Today I extract... number 23! We've chosen a winner!

抽選 refers to <vocabulary>drawing lots</vocabulary> and randomly selecting a winner or winners from a pool of candidates or entries.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
